Cross-Platform Access.

You have three points of entry to the market, so choose what works best for you. For fast access to analysis and to manage your assets, choose the web-terminal. For professional traders and private trading companies there is the institutional-level desktop trading terminal. The mobile app is for the most dynamic traders who need to trade cryptocurrencies and track portfolios.

Why Choose The Tradelize Cryptocurrency Trading Terminale?

Versatility

The trading terminal fits various trading styles, like signals, day trading, swing trading, investment and arbitrage.

Speed

Get fast access to exchange data and react more quickly to price changes in the terminal than on traditional exchange platforms.

Risk Diversification

The terminal lets you reduce risk by splitting up funds between exchanges and managing all accounts in one interface.

Security

We use a modern SHA-256 encryption algorithm.

Professionalism

A cutting-edge solution developed for traders by traders.

Full Customization

Individualize settings in your workspace and set filters for different tools in the trading terminal.

Frequently asked questions about the cryptocurrency trading terminal

Read these answers to the most popular questions about the trading terminal

Which exchanges does the Tradelize trading terminal have access to?

You can trade on more than 10 of the most popular spot and contract exchanges: HitBTC, Huobi, Bittrex, Bitfinex, BitMex, Binance, Kraken, Okex. Binance Futures, ByBit and Tradelize Demo.

About Tradelize

Tradelize is a unique ecosystem that unites traders, investors, analysts and leading media of the cryptocurrency market. Tradelize offers every market participant a variety of professional tools for trading, scaling, and monetizing their expertise. With Tradelize, you can create your own brand and transform it into a private trading company.

Start Earning With Us

Become an official Tradelize representative in your region. Invite friends and the audience you already have to talk about the Tradelize ecosystem and make use of all the advantages of cross-marketing. Help popularize Tradelize ecosystem products for some extra passive income.

Our Partners.
